While all goblins enjoy singing, goblin war chanters pride themselves on mastering the art of vocal performance. Their ballads and jingles are undeniably catchy, and serve their purpose in battle well, inspiring goblins and distracting foes. Whether they are actually enjoyable is entirely subjective. **[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)): DC 15 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 10 [Goblin War Chanter](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3027) **Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 175 1.1 **Perception** +5; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59) **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Goblin](/Languages.aspx?ID=6) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +6, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +7, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +4, [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) +7, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +6 **Str** +2 **Dex** +3 **Con** +2 **Int** +1 **Wis** +0 **Cha** +4 **Items** [dogslicer](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1675), [Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4), [Shortbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=77) (10 arrows) --- **AC** 17 **Fort** +7 **Ref** +8 **Will** +5 **HP** 16 **Goblin Scuttle** **Trigger** A goblin ally ends a move action adjacent to the goblin; **Effect** The goblin Steps. --- **Speed** 25 feet **Melee** dogslicer +8 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Backstabber](/Traits.aspx?ID=172), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)), **Damage** 1d6+2 slashing **Ranged** shortbow +8 ([deadly d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 0](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)), **Damage** 1d6 piercing **Occult Spontaneous Spells** DC 17, attack +7 - **Cantrips (1st)** [Figment](/Spells.aspx?ID=1528), [Courageous Anthem](/Spells.aspx?ID=1763), [Message](/Spells.aspx?ID=190), [Telekinetic Hand](/Spells.aspx?ID=1715), [Telekinetic Projectile](/Spells.aspx?ID=334) - **1st** [Bless](/Spells.aspx?ID=25), [Soothe](/Spells.aspx?ID=291) (2 slots) **Goblin Song** The war chanter sings annoying goblin songs, distracting foes with silly and repetitive lyrics. The chanter attempts a [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=45) check against the Will DCs of up to two enemies within 30 feet. This has the usual traits and restrictions for a Performance check.
**Critical Success** The target takes a –1 status penalty to Perception checks and Will saves for 1 minute.
**Success** As critical success, but the target is affected for only 1 round.
**Critical Failure** The target is temporarily immune to Goblin Song for 1 hour.
name: Goblin War Chanter
